attributes.action: To return and stop any taxes during the Furlough Scheme for all key workers.
attributes.additional_details: This is a fair action to be taken as the Goverment helps people with 80% off their salaries but key workers are risking their lives going to work and still money are taken from their salaries.
attributes.background: To be returned and stoped any taxes during the Furlough Scheme for all key workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
